# createDefaultAccountState

Creates the default account state for the given chains.

## Import

```ts
import { createDefaultAccountState } from "@account-kit/core";
```

## Parameters

### chains

`Chain[]`
the chains to create the default account state for

## Returns

`NoUndefined<StoreState<T>["accounts"]>`
The default account state for the given chains
